headline: S&P Dow Jones Indices Announces Changes to the S&P/TSX Composite Index
summary: The shareholders of Nuvei Corporation (TSX: NVEI) have agreed to the terms of a Plan of Arrangement resulting in the acquisition by Advent International. Each share of Nuvei will receive USD$34.00 cash consideration. Nuvei shares will be removed from the S&P/TSX Composite Index prior to the open of trading on Monday, November 18, 2024.

headline: Get Paid by UPS Stock While It Turns Its Business Around
summary: As part of my investing strategy, I sometimes like to buy great dividend stocks in the middle of turnarounds, which brings me to the logistics giant United Parcel Service (UPS). The company benefited from a surge in package volumes from the COVID-19 pandemic. However, that proved to be a temporary windfall, and shares have tumbled 31% in the past three years. I believe this sell-off could be an opportunity for shareholders to get in on a company with a solid dividend yield and capital appreciati

headline: S&P Global Launches Kensho LLM-ready API (beta), Making its Structured Data Accessible for Generative AI
summary: S&P Global (NYSE: SPGI) announced today the launch of a new solution in open beta that enables customers to access several high-priority S&P Global datasets for generative AI (GenAI) use cases. Kensho LLM-ready API integrates seamlessly with large language models (LLMs) like GPT, Gemini, or Claude, allowing customers to use natural language to query S&P Global's tabular datasets. The API will help engineering, product, and business teams across financial services save significant time and resour

headline: Can McDonald’s (NYSE:MCD) Leverage Brand Strength to Remain a Top Dividend Stock?
summary: As an investor, I especially appreciate companies with strong brand recognition. Brand strength helps businesses consistently grow over time and remain resilient in challenging environments. As leaders in their respective industries, Dividend Aristocrats masterfully embody this characteristic. These are S&P 500 index (SPX) components that have delivered at least 25 consecutive years of dividend hikes to shareholders.
